About the Company: Zenith Fibres Ltd is the only company in India manufacturing the entire range of Polypropylene Staple Fibre (PPSF).The Company also trades in Polypropylene Spun Yarn.The product range of the company includes PPSF of various shades-Woven,Non-Woven,Knitted and Apolon- Apolon is PPSF manufactured by melt spinning of isotactic polypropylene resin.
